title: Lol Tolhurst
content: Laurence Andrew "Lol" Tolhurst (born 3 February 1959) is an English musician, songwriter, producer, and author. He was a founding member of The Cure, for which he first played drums before switching to keyboards. He left the Cure in 1989 and later formed the bands Presence and Levinhurst. He has also published two books and developed the Curious Creatures podcast.[2]
